```{=html}
<script>
  (function () {
    // Preserve any query string or hash
    var target = "/personal.html" + window.location.search + window.location.hash;
    window.location.replace(target);
  })();
</script>

  display: flex;

  background: #0D0D0F;
  color: #F5F5F4;
  text-align: center;
  padding: 2rem;
">
  <h1 style="font-size: 1.5rem; font-weight: 400; margin-bottom: 1rem;">
    Redirecting...
  </h1>
  <p style="color: #A1A1A6;">
    The blog has moved. If you're not redirected automatically,
    <a href="/personal.html" style="color: #F9A875;">go to the personal blog</a>.
  </p>
</main>
```
